item.title: Pi degradeing items!
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

[quote=“king he he, post:1, topic:396972”]hey my server has this but i hit 10 times and nothing happened… someone please help! i add the stuff into client.java also

/* DEGRADING */
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 13899) {
c.degradeTime++;
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899 && c.degradeTime == 10) {// VLS Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s longsword has degraded into nothing.Bad LUCK”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}[/quote]

this is : l skinner l 's post from a different post on mopar - im not taking credit if it works.

                /* DEGRADING */
      if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 0) {
      c.degradeTime++;
      }
      if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == [item id] && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade.
      c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
      c.sendMessage("Your vesta's longsword has degraded into nothing."); // send a message
      c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
      }
      if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == [item id] && c.degradeTime == 500) {// STAT Degrade.
      c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
      c.sendMessage("Your Statius warhammer has degraded into nothing."); // send a message
      c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
      }
      if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == [item id] && c.degradeTime == 450) {// Spear Degrade.
      c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
      c.sendMessage("Your vesta's spear has degraded into nothing."); // send a message
      c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
      }

but where theres a 0 - thats where you put id. ill put [item id] to show you so when you paste, just change to the ID
but dont put brackets around it

Read full topic

item.title: Pi degradeing items!
item.dc:creator: @king_he_he king he he
item.description:
@king_he_he wrote:

hey my server has this but i hit 10 times and nothing happened… someone please help! i add the stuff into client.java also

/* DEGRADING */
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 13899) {
c.degradeTime++;
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899 && c.degradeTime == 10) {// VLS Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s longsword has degraded into nothing.Bad LUCK”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}

Read full topic
